Pre-Game Insights: Analysts predicted a close game between the two rival teams
Key Match Events: Teoscar Hernández hit a grand slam in the third inning
Post-Match Reflections: Dodgers manager Dave Roberts said, 'We’ve got to win tomorrow night to then pick up the pieces for Game 5'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was marked by 'Beat L.A.' chants and thick with an encore energy carried over from the Game 2 maelstrom
